synopsis.text:
How about embarking on a journey with Shouta, a 25-year-old man stuck in a rut, as he navigates the unexpected twists of fate? Once a target of ridicule by his successful and attractive female classmates at their recent reunion, Shouta's life takes a dramatic turn when he stumbles into his old school's swimming pool.

Suddenly, he finds himself 10 years in the past, surrounded by his fifth-grade classmates during a swimming lesson. With a newfound opportunity to rewrite his destiny, Shouta must now face the challenges of youth and the temptations of being a grown man in a child's world.

Will he succumb to his previous life's misfortunes, or will he seize this chance to change his future? Join Shouta as he navigates the complexities of growing up (twice) in this captivating anime that explores the power of second chances and the intricacies of human relationships.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
